snippet: Leicester City midfielder Nampalys Mendy will be out of action for around five weeks after undergoing an surgery on his ankle, manager Claudio Ranieri has said....

headline.main: Leicester's Mendy Out for Five Weeks, Says Ranieri
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Mendy Out for Five Weeks, Says Ranieri

lead_paragraph: Leicester City midfielder Nampalys Mendy will be out of action for around five weeks after undergoing an surgery on his ankle, manager Claudio Ranieri has said.

snippet: Chinese businessman Tony Xia has agreed to buy Aston Villa, the club said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Chinese Businessman Xia Agrees to Buy Villa
headline.print_headline: Chinese Businessman Xia Agrees to Buy Villa

lead_paragraph: Chinese businessman Tony Xia has agreed to buy Aston Villa, the club said on Wednesday.

snippet: Southampton manager Claude Puel said on Wednesday he was in the dark about reported takeover talks between the Premier League club and Chinese company Lander Sports Development....

headline.main: Puel in the Dark About Southampton Takeover Talks
headline.print_headline: Puel in the Dark About Southampton Takeover Talks

lead_paragraph: Southampton manager Claude Puel said on Wednesday he was in the dark about reported takeover talks between the Premier League club and Chinese company Lander Sports Development.

snippet: Manager Quique Sanchez Flores will leave Watford after their final match of the season on Sunday, the Premier League club said on Friday....

headline.main: Manager Flores to Leave Watford After Sunday's Match
headline.print_headline: Manager Flores to Leave Watford After Sunday's Match

lead_paragraph: Manager Quique Sanchez Flores will leave Watford after their final match of the season on Sunday, the Premier League club said on Friday.

snippet: Liverpool midfielder Emre Can has returned to training ahead of the second leg of the side's Europa League semi-final against Villarreal on Thursday, as he nears a full recovery from an ankle injury....

headline.main: Liverpool's Can Back in Training Ahead of Europa Clash
headline.print_headline: Liverpool's Can Back in Training Ahead of Europa Clash

lead_paragraph: Liverpool midfielder Emre Can has returned to training ahead of the second leg of the side's Europa League semi-final against Villarreal on Thursday, as he nears a full recovery from an ankle injury.

snippet: Striker Peter Crouch is still an invaluable member of the Stoke City team despite his limited playing time this season, manager Mark Hughes has said....

lead_paragraph: Striker Peter Crouch is still an invaluable member of the Stoke City team despite his limited playing time this season, manager Mark Hughes has said.

snippet: Leicester City goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel is likely to return from a fractured hand in Tuesday's Premier League clash at Bournemouth, manager Claudio Ranieri has said....

headline.print_headline: Schmeichel Likely to Return Against Bournemouth, Says Ranieri

lead_paragraph: Leicester City goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel is likely to return from a fractured hand in Tuesday's Premier League clash at Bournemouth, manager Claudio Ranieri has said.

snippet: Chelsea still have a chance of finishing in the Premier League top four and securing Champions League football at the end of the season, interim manager Guus Hiddink has said....

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Can Still Finish in Top Four, Says Hiddink

lead_paragraph: Chelsea still have a chance of finishing in the Premier League top four and securing Champions League football at the end of the season, interim manager Guus Hiddink has said.

snippet: Although in second place in the Premier League under Manuel Pellegrini, City announced it had signed Guardiola, of Bayern Munich, to take over as manager next season....

headline.main: Manchester City, Set for a Banner Year, Hires Pep Guardiola
headline.print_headline: Set for a Banner Year, Man City Plans a Change

abstract: Manchester City signs Bayern Munich manager Pep Guardiola to three-year contract, making current manager Manuel Pellegrini lame duck.
lead_paragraph: Although in second place in the Premier League under Manuel Pellegrini, City announced it had signed Guardiola, of Bayern Munich, to take over as manager next season.
